name: h264-encoder-mockup
description: Video codecs for Media and RTMP servers

scripts.package: tar cvzf build/medooze-fake-h264-encoder.tgz  `([ "$(uname)" = 'Darwin' ] && echo "-s |^|medooze-fake-h264-encoder/|") || echo " --transform=flags=r;s|^|medooze-fake-h264-encoder/|"` media-server/src/* media-server/include/* media-server/ext/libdatachannels/src/* media-server/ext/crc32c/* lib/* package.json index.js  binding.gyp  README.md src
scripts.dist: node-gyp configure && node-gyp build --jobs=max && mkdir -p dist && tar cvzf dist/medooze-fake-h264-encoder-`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`.tgz `([ "$(uname)" = 'Darwin' ] && echo "-s |^|medooze-fake-h264-encoder/|") || echo " --transform=flags=r;s|^|medooze-fake-h264-encoder/|"` package.json index.js   README.md lib/* build/Release/medooze-fake-h264-encoder.node

author: Sergio Garcia Murillo @ Medooze
